Field Label: Choose a format for the code list:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, List of codes separated by pipe character | 3, CSV file upload with codes in column 1 and labels in column 2.

Field Label:
Code list
Format is "1 = Chocolate | 2 = Strawberry | 3 = Vanilla". The Pipe character is required between codes because line breaks will be lost if the data dictionary (CSV) is used to update this field.
